decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing powerful spells and creatures to control the board and overwhelm opponents with big threats. By utilizing powerful creatures like Terror of the Peaks and Genesis Ultimatum, along with control spells like Spikefield Hazard and Brazen Borrower, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and dictate the pace of the game. The deck also includes ramp cards like Cultivate and Beanstalk Giant to ensure you can consistently drop big threats ahead of schedule. The inclusion of Obosh, the Preypiercer as companion adds an extra layer of aggression and power to your creatures.

The deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through the use of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage and controlling the board with powerful planeswalkers like Ashiok and Ugin. The deck also utilizes cards like Atris and Mazemind Tome to draw cards and filter through the deck. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion allows for additional value and card advantage by blinking permanents for repeated effects. Overall, the deck seeks to outvalue and outlast the opponent through meticulous control of resources.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with powerful green creatures and ramping up mana with cards like Gilded Goose and Tangled Florahedron. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays, using cards like Feasting Troll King and Wicked Wolf to control the board while constantly putting pressure on the opponent. The Great Henge provides additional card draw and life gain, while Trail of Crumbs helps to dig for more creatures. Vivien, Monsters' Advocate can provide additional threats, and Crawling Barrens can become a win condition in the late game.

The central idea of this Aggro - Red Deck Wins archetype is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures like Kargan Intimidator, Rimrock Knight, and Anax, Hardened in the Forge. Supporting cards like Torbran, Thane of Red Fell boost the damage output of the creatures, while spells like Embercleave and Fire Prophecy provide removal and additional damage. The deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and deal damage efficiently, with the goal of finishing off the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of control spells, counters, removal, and card advantage to dominate the game. With Yorion as a companion, the deck can create extra value by blinking permanents for added advantage. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's strategy, control the board, and generate card advantage through card draw and filtering effects. The deck is designed to outlast opponents and eventually win through powerful threats like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon.

The key strategy of this Esper Control deck revolves around maximizing value through flickering permanents with Yorion, Sky Nomad. By including multiple copies of Yorion, Skyclave Apparition, and Mazemind Tome, along with other impactful cards like Extinction Event and Elspeth Conquers Death, the deck aims to control the board and outvalue opponents. The deck has a strong late game plan with Ruinous Ultimatum and Emeria's Call, along with a versatile sideboard option in Cling to Dust. Overall, the deck excels at grinding out advantages and controlling the game's pace.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, powerful creatures that focus on generating value and putting pressure on the opponent early in the game. By utilizing creatures with strong enters-the-battlefield effects and cards that generate food tokens, the deck can quickly establish a strong board presence and outpace the opponent. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Trail of Crumbs provide additional card draw and mana acceleration, allowing the deck to maintain momentum and continue applying pressure throughout the match.

The main concept of this deck is to establish a strong board presence early with efficient creatures like Luminarch Aspirant and Lovestruck Beast. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and using cards like Giant Killer to control the board. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Elspeth Conquers Death provide additional value and resilience for the deck. Vivien, Monsters' Advocate serves as a versatile Planeswalker that can generate card advantage or provide additional threats. Overall, this Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on fast and proactive gameplay to overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy and controlling the board through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. It also aims to gain incremental advantage by utilizing cards like Mazemind Tome and Omen of the Sea. The win condition involves eventually overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and utilizing the Companion Yorion, Sky Nomad for additional value. The deck's strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent by controlling the game and gaining incremental advantage over time.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal, and card advantage to outvalue and outlast the opponent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while slowly building up resources and establishing a win condition through cards like Shark Typhoon and Ashiok, Nightmare Muse. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in gameplay. Overall, the deck seeks to dominate the board and grind out a victory through careful and calculated decision-making.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by quickly playing creatures with powerful abilities and attack, backed up by key support cards like The Great Henge and Embercleave. With a mix of versatile creatures like Brushfire Elemental and Questing Beast, alongside removal spells like Bonecrusher Giant and Shatterskull Smashing, the deck aims to pressure opponents early and maintain a strong board presence. The addition of cards like Vivien, Monsters' Advocate and Scavenging Ooze provide card advantage and graveyard disruption, ensuring the deck can handle a variety of threats and maintain its tempo.

The key strategy of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Robber of the Rich, and Brushfire Elemental, supported by cards like Lovestruck Beast and Kazandu Mammoth. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early pressure and efficient creatures while leveraging powerful cards like Questing Beast and Embercleave for additional damage. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Primal Might provide additional value and flexibility to adapt to different situations. The mana base is optimized for consistency and to support the deck's aggressive game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and ramping up mana quickly to overwhelm opponents with powerful threats. By utilizing cards like Lovestruck Beast and Feasting Troll King, along with mana producers like Gilded Goose and Tangled Florahedron, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Witch's Oven and Trail of Crumbs provide additional utility and card advantage, while cards like Kogla, the Titan Ape and The Great Henge offer additional power and resilience in longer games.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy utilizing powerful green creatures such as Lovestruck Beast, Kazandu Mammoth, and Feasting Troll King. By utilizing mana acceleration with cards like Gilded Goose and Castle Garenbrig, this deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence and apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like The Great Henge and Trail of Crumbs provide additional card advantage and resources to maintain the aggression. Additionally, cards like Thrashing Brontodon and Witch's Oven offer additional utility and removal options to maintain board control.

The main concept of the deck is to flood the board with aggressive green creatures and overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful offense. The deck focuses on generating mana quickly with cards like Gilded Goose and Castle Garenbrig, while also utilizing cards like The Great Henge and Feasting Troll King to maintain card advantage and generate additional value. With a strong creature base and a mix of removal and card draw, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and outpace the opponent to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Cultivate and Beanstalk Giant to cast powerful spells like Genesis Ultimatum. The deck also includes a variety of big creatures like Terror of the Peaks and Lovestruck Beast to control the board and deal damage. The inclusion of Obosh as a companion boosts the deck's damage output. Overall, the key strategy is to control the game through a combination of ramping, big creatures, and damage spells to overwhelm the opponent.
